00032 /*
00033  * Device driver for the Sensirion SHT1x/SHT7x family of humidity and
00034  * temperature sensors.
00035  */
00036 
00037 #include "contiki.h"
00038 #include <stdio.h>
00039 
00040 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00041 #include <msp430.h>
00042 #else
00043 #include <io.h>
00044 #include <signal.h>
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #include <dev/sht11.h>
00048 #include "sht11-arch.h"
00049 
00050 #define DEBUG 0
00051 
00052 #if DEBUG
00053 #include <stdio.h>
00054 #define PRINTF(...) printf(__VA_ARGS__)
00055 #else
00056 #define PRINTF(...)
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 #ifndef SDA_0
00060 #define SDA_0()   (SHT11_PxDIR |=  BV(SHT11_ARCH_SDA))  /* SDA Output=0 */
00061 #define SDA_1()   (SHT11_PxDIR &= ~BV(SHT11_ARCH_SDA))  /* SDA Input */
00062 #define SDA_IS_1  (SHT11_PxIN & BV(SHT11_ARCH_SDA))
00063 
00064 #define SCL_0()   (SHT11_PxOUT &= ~BV(SHT11_ARCH_SCL))  /* SCL Output=0 */
00065 #define SCL_1()   (SHT11_PxOUT |=  BV(SHT11_ARCH_SCL))  /* SCL Output=1 */
00066 #endif
00067                                 /* adr   command  r/w */
00068 #define  STATUS_REG_W   0x06    /* 000    0011    0 */
00069 #define  STATUS_REG_R   0x07    /* 000    0011    1 */
00070 #define  MEASURE_TEMP   0x03    /* 000    0001    1 */
00071 #define  MEASURE_HUMI   0x05    /* 000    0010    1 */
00072 #define  RESET          0x1e    /* 000    1111    0 */
00073 
00074 /* This can probably be reduced to 250ns according to data sheet. */
00075 #ifndef delay_400ns
00076 #define delay_400ns() _NOP()
00077 #endif
00078 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 static void
00080 sstart(void)
00081 {
00082   SDA_1(); SCL_0();
00083   delay_400ns();
00084   SCL_1();
00085   delay_400ns();
00086   SDA_0();
00087   delay_400ns();
00088   SCL_0();
00089   delay_400ns();
00090   SCL_1();
00091   delay_400ns();
00092   SDA_1();
00093   delay_400ns();
00094   SCL_0();
00095 }
00096 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 static void
00098 sreset(void)
00099 {
00100   int i;
00101   SDA_1();
00102   SCL_0();
00103   for(i = 0; i < 9 ; i++) {
00104     SCL_1();
00105     delay_400ns();
00106     SCL_0();
00107     delay_400ns();
00108   }
00109   sstart();                     /* Start transmission, why??? */
00110 }
00111 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00112 /*
00113  * Return true if we received an ACK.
00114  */
00115 static int
00116 swrite(unsigned _c)
00117 {
00118   unsigned char c = _c;
00119   int i;
00120   int ret;
00121 
00122   for(i = 0; i < 8; i++, c <<= 1) {
00123     if(c & 0x80) {
00124       SDA_1();
00125     } else {
00126       SDA_0();
00127     }
00128     SCL_1();
00129     delay_400ns();
00130     SCL_0();
00131     delay_400ns();
00132   }
00133 
00134   SDA_1();
00135   SCL_1();
00136   delay_400ns();
00137   ret = !SDA_IS_1;
00138 
00139   SCL_0();
00140 
00141   return ret;
00142 }
00143 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 static unsigned
00145 sread(int send_ack)
00146 {
00147   int i;
00148   unsigned char c = 0x00;
00149 
00150   SDA_1();
00151   for(i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00152     c <<= 1;
00153     SCL_1();
00154     delay_400ns();
00155     if(SDA_IS_1) {
00156       c |= 0x1;
00157     }
00158     SCL_0();
00159     delay_400ns();
00160   }
00161 
00162   if(send_ack) {
00163     SDA_0();
00164   }
00165   SCL_1();
00166   delay_400ns();
00167   SCL_0();
00168 
00169   SDA_1();                      /* Release SDA */
00170 
00171   return c;
00172 }
00173 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00174 #define CRC_CHECK
00175 #ifdef CRC_CHECK
00176 static unsigned char
00177 rev8bits(unsigned char v)
00178 {
00179   unsigned char r = v;
00180   int s = 7;
00181 
00182   for (v >>= 1; v; v >>= 1) {
00183     r <<= 1;
00184     r |= v & 1;
00185     s--;
00186   }
00187   r <<= s;                  /* Shift when v's highest bits are zero */
00188   return r;
00189 }
00190 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00191 /* BEWARE: Bit reversed CRC8 using polynomial ^8 + ^5 + ^4 + 1 */
00192 static unsigned
00193 crc8_add(unsigned acc, unsigned byte)
00194 {
00195   int i;
00196   acc ^= byte;
00197   for(i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00198     if(acc & 0x80) {
00199       acc = (acc << 1) ^ 0x31;
00200     } else {
00201       acc <<= 1;
00202     }
00203   }
00204   return acc & 0xff;
00205 }
00206 #endif /* CRC_CHECK */
00207 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00208 /*
00209  * Power up the device. The device can be used after an additional
00210  * 11ms waiting time.
00211  */
00212 void
00213 sht11_init(void)
00214 {
00215   /*
00216    * SCL Output={0,1}
00217    * SDA 0: Output=0
00218    *     1: Input and pull-up (Output=0)
00219    */
00220 #ifdef SHT11_INIT
00221   SHT11_INIT();
00222 #else
00223   SHT11_PxOUT |= BV(SHT11_ARCH_PWR);
00224   SHT11_PxOUT &= ~(BV(SHT11_ARCH_SDA) | BV(SHT11_ARCH_SCL));
00225   SHT11_PxDIR |= BV(SHT11_ARCH_PWR) | BV(SHT11_ARCH_SCL);
00226 #endif
00227 }
00228 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00229 /*
00230  * Power of device.
00231  */
00232 void
00233 sht11_off(void)
00234 {
00235 #ifdef SHT11_OFF
00236   SHT11_OFF();
00237 #else
00238   SHT11_PxOUT &= ~BV(SHT11_ARCH_PWR);
00239   SHT11_PxOUT &= ~(BV(SHT11_ARCH_SDA) | BV(SHT11_ARCH_SCL));
00240   SHT11_PxDIR |= BV(SHT11_ARCH_PWR) | BV(SHT11_ARCH_SCL);
00241 #endif
00242 }
00243 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00244 /*
00245  * Only commands MEASURE_HUMI or MEASURE_TEMP!
00246  */
00247 static unsigned int
00248 scmd(unsigned cmd)
00249 {
00250   unsigned long n;
00251 
00252   if(cmd != MEASURE_HUMI && cmd != MEASURE_TEMP) {
00253     PRINTF("Illegal command: %d\n", cmd);
00254     return -1;
00255   }
00256 
00257   sstart();                     /* Start transmission */
00258   if(!swrite(cmd)) {
00259     PRINTF("SHT11: scmd - swrite failed\n");
00260     goto fail;
00261   }
00262 
00263   for(n = 0; n < 250000; n++) {
00264     if(!SDA_IS_1) {
00265       unsigned t0, t1, rcrc;
00266       t0 = sread(1);
00267       t1 = sread(1);
00268       rcrc = sread(0);
00269       PRINTF("SHT11: scmd - read %d, %d\n", t0, t1);
00270 #ifdef CRC_CHECK
00271       {
00272         unsigned crc;
00273         crc = crc8_add(0x0, cmd);
00274         crc = crc8_add(crc, t0);
00275         crc = crc8_add(crc, t1);
00276         if(crc != rev8bits(rcrc)) {
00277           PRINTF("SHT11: scmd - crc check failed %d vs %d\n",
00278                  crc, rev8bits(rcrc));
00279           goto fail;
00280         }
00281       }
00282 #endif
00283       return (t0 << 8) | t1;
00284     }
00285   }
00286 
00287  fail:
00288   sreset();
00289   return -1;
00290 }
00291 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00292 /*
00293  * Call may take up to 210ms.
00294  */
00295 unsigned int
00296 sht11_temp(void)
00297 {
00298   return scmd(MEASURE_TEMP);
00299 }
00300 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00301 /*
00302  * Call may take up to 210ms.
00303  */
00304 unsigned int
00305 sht11_humidity(void)
00306 {
00307   return scmd(MEASURE_HUMI);
00308 }
00309 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00310 #if 1 /* But ok! */
00311 unsigned
00312 sht11_sreg(void)
00313 {
00314   unsigned sreg, rcrc;
00315 
00316   sstart();                     /* Start transmission */
00317   if(!swrite(STATUS_REG_R)) {
00318     goto fail;
00319   }
00320 
00321   sreg = sread(1);
00322   rcrc = sread(0);
00323 
00324 #ifdef CRC_CHECK
00325   {
00326     unsigned crc;
00327     crc = crc8_add(0x0, STATUS_REG_R);
00328     crc = crc8_add(crc, sreg);
00329     if (crc != rev8bits(rcrc))
00330       goto fail;
00331   }
00332 #endif
00333 
00334   return sreg;
00335 
00336  fail:
00337   sreset();
00338   return -1;
00339 }
00340 #endif

00355
